programme.title: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: It’s estimated that roughly 10,000 people are wrongfully convicted in the U.S. each and every year for crimes they didn’t commit. These wrongful convictions mean that the real perpetrators may still be out there and that we all lose when the criminal justice system we rely on becomes corrupt.

programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.desc: ''The Fabulous Buchannon Boys'' - Mitch receives an unexpected visit from his free-spirited brother, whose troubled son entices Hobie to surf the pylons of a treacherous condemned pier. Meanwhile, a local vendor nearly causes a riot when his bikinis disintegrate in the water.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Drowning Pool'' - A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unravelling whether his death was an accidental drowning, or murder.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Sky is Falling'' - After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.desc: ''Cretin of the Shallows'' - Several people are murdered at the beach by a mysterious man in ghoulish make-up and Eddie is knocked unconscious by what he describes as a "cretin." Eddie's report is met with skepticism until the identity of the killer is dramatically revealed.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Point of Attack'' - After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Sandcastles'' - Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as "Hector the Collector."

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Thin or Die'' - Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life threatening... Meanwhile, Mitch's life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Trophy, Part 1'' - Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: Paseka: The Easter Elephant
programme.desc: On Easter morning, a baby elephant is mysteriously abandoned by her herd in the wilds of Botswana’s Okavango Delta. Saved from certain death by a bizarre chain of events, she forces herself into a very unusual, captive elephant herd. This is “Paseka's” story.

programme.title: Life On Us: A Microscopic Safari
programme.desc: Just like planet Earth, our body is composed of diverse landscapes surprising wildlife. This award-winning film offers a unique microscopic safari, encountering the creatures that live, compete, feed, on breed on the surface or in the depths of our body. Some may seem harmful, others are useful and even essential to our survival, but all participate in the biological balance of the human body.

programme.title: Monwabisi
programme.desc: Monwa’s life is tied to the sea. However, his relationship to the marine environment is based in fear. David and the crew aim to help him overcome this fear by getting him into the water. Monwa learns to free dive, and once the crew is satisfied that he can handle more, Monwa takes the plunge and swims with blue sharks in an underwater canyon off the coast of the Cape of Good Hope.

programme.title: Africa's Primeval Oceans
programme.desc: The scene is the southern tip of Africa. Just off shore, two very different seas meet to form one of the most diverse marine environments on earth. The meeting of icy Atlantic and warm Indian waters not only affect life underwater, they are giant forces that shape the land, climate, and all its creatures. The Portuguese explorer Bartholomew Dias and his crew called it the Cape of Storms.

programme.title: Saving Sharks, Raising Awareness
programme.desc: Every hour 10,000 sharks are fished worldwide. Yet, this mythical predator plays a key role in regulating marine life. So now, Jérôme Delafosse has launched The Shark Project - a plea to reconcile humankind with the scary shark - and is traveling the globe to raise awareness about these marvelous animals. Can Jérôme save our sharks from possible extinction?

programme.title: Submarines: The Invisible Weapon
programme.desc: You can’t see them. You can’t hear them. And you never know exactly where they are. The life of submarines is secret and fascinating. In this film, we go inside one of the French navy's legendary vessels, the Rubis, and to where the next nuclear submarine, the Barracuda, is being built. From technological prowess to human exploits, the film submerges us in a timeless amphibian adventure.

programme.title: Peregrine Falcon: Lord of the Skies
programme.desc: While hunting, it can reach speeds of over 90 miles per hour but during its aerial displays it holds the all-time speed record of 242 miles per hour. So it’s not surprising that this powerful bird has conquered the planet and can be found on the five continents. Worshipped, sculpted or trained for prestigious hunts, the power and beauty of this bird has always fascinated mankind.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Broken Lives" - Dr. G must figure out if a decomposed body is that of a local missing woman and if she was murdered.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Life Interrupted" - During her career as a medical examiner, Dr. G has autopsied thousands of murder victims. In this episode, Dr. G shares her most memorable case.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Journey" - Dr. G reviews a woman's medical records and learns that that she suffered from an auto-immune disease called lupus, which might have something to do with her death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Speeds" - Motor vehicle fatalities account for many of the cases that come into the morgue. Dr. G offers expertise as to how to get behind the wheel and not wind up on a steel table.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Fatal Flaw" - Parents rush their baby to the hospital, but she tragically dies in her mother's arms. Now, Dr. G must help these devastated parents understand what happened.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Dive" - A train engineer panics when he spots a man lying on the tracks. He blows the whistle, but the train can't stop in time. It's up to Dr. G to piece together how Andy Santana died.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Decent" - It's up to Dr. G, along with the National Transportation Safety Board, to piece together how and why a plane crashed, leaving the pilot dead.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "A Deadly Deal" - Reed Baley is found unconscious the morning after his bachelor party. Now, it's up to Dr. G to determine if alcohol was to blame or if there was another cause of death.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Evil Intent" - Authorities respond to a fire, only to find Carolyn Casey's body at the center of the blaze. With little evidence and no witnesses, Dr. G must find the cause of death to catch her killer.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Disturbing Behavior" - Leo Guzman falls off a ladder while painting a house. At first, his death seems to be an open-and-shut case but, as the autopsy unfolds, Dr. G believes there may be more to this case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A human skeleton was discovered in the North Carolina marshlands. Investigators learned she'd been dead for 18 months.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After shooting his victims in the head, the killer staged the scene, placed the incriminating evidence into a plastic bag and tossed it into the river.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a tragic twist of fate, just days after the woman sold her home and moved to a modest trailer, a fire took both the trailer and her life. But the autopsy proved this was no accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A security guard disappeared from his post without a trace his remains were found a year later in a remote camp site.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured, and police believed he was the victim of a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When hunters found a skull in a Texas canyon, police found bits of clothing, small bones and a strand of hair. A forensic artist reconstructed her face. Now all they had to do was find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S12:E2 "Big Shed Antlers, When to Snort-Wheeze"
programme.desc: On this week's episode, we first join Josh Sparks and Kaleb Greiner shed hunting in Iowa. They've picked up some good antlers including two bucks they know well. Then we join Jared Mills who discusses why frost seeding clover can be so productive and how to do it. Finally, Bill covers a hunt from 2008 with his good friend, Mike Sawyer, where a snort wheeze call was the key to a successful harvest.

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S12:E3 "Off-Beat Tips for November Success, Shed Hunting"
programme.desc: On this week's episode we start things off with Bill performing soil tests on the farm. He explains both how he does these tests and why it's important to do them to get the most out of your land. Next we join Drake Lamb who gives an update on a buck he presumed was dead. Finally, we join Jared Mills who updates us on some of the antlers he and Mike found on their river farm. He also covers a successful hunt from November of 2013, when he snuck in at midnight to hang a stand. Here is a link to the soil test kits: https://www.frigidforage.com/hot-buys/soil-test-kit/

programme.title: Family Funnies
programme.desc: Episode 106 - Part clip show and part comedian talking heads show, "Family Funnies" puts the fun in dysfunctional. The top family-friendly comedians speak directly to you the viewer to tell us about their funniest and most relatable family memories & milestones - as well as their parenting experiences and tips. The comedians cover family themed topics (Ex: Family Weddings, Family Vacations, Homework Rules) that are hilariously paired with similarly themed clip compilations. Warning: Results may vary, but will always be hilarious.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Alex Velluto - Thirsty
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Leland Klassen - More True
programme.desc: Raised on a farm in the heart of Canada, Leland quickly learned that shoveling manure and weeding potatoes, although lucrative, wasnít his passion in life. So with absolutely no clear direction or vision for his future, he did what everyone does when they find themselves in that position - he went to University. He wisely chose his classes based on whichever cute girl happened to catch his attention and after several short years of last minute cramming and late assignments, Leland graduated from the University of Saskatchewan with a degree in Anthropology. As you might have guessed, Lelandís university education opened many doors for him in the years to come, but for some reason he was dissatisfied working for a courier as a night shift stock boy. By this time married and with his first child soon on the way, the most responsible and obvious choice was, of course, to pursue a career in the entertainment industry. Starting off at amateur nights and seedy bars Leland decided right from the beginning that he would remain clean despite what everyone else was doing and as a result over the last 16 years Leland has become recognized as Canadaís premier clean comedian. With his unique intelligence and wit, Leland has carved out quite a niche for himself in the world of entertainment. Using his farm boy charm and handsome (although somewhat inbred) Mennonite good looks, Lelandís clever observations and rich life experiences are brought to life in a one-of-a-kind show. LELANDíS CREDITS: Halifax Comedy Fest 2014, Just for Laughs in Montreal, 1999, 2001, 2004 and 2014, Host of Popcorn TV, Featured on Thou Shalt Laugh 5, Host of Comedy Tournament, Co-Host GMA Canada 2009, 2012 and 2013, Promise Keepers Canada, Episode of the US syndicated comedy series ìBananasî, Two of his own television seriesí on the West Coast, as well as Appeared on numerous other programs across the United States and Canada, such as Comedy Network, CBC Television, YTV, Star TV, Global and Discovery Kids.

programme.title: David Dyer - Further Along Than Anyone Expected
programme.desc: David Dyer has been performing at stand-up at comedy clubs and corporate events for over twenty years. He’s worked with some of the best comics in the industry including Mike Birbiglia, Jim Breuer, and Lewis Black. He’s been a contributing writer to NBC’s Late Night with Jimmy Fallon and ABC’s Politically Incorrect. He’s a regular on the nationally syndicated Bob and Tom Show and often appears on the roster for their “Friends of The Bob and Tom Show” comedy tour. He’s the host of a new web series called Sidecar Sessions where he interviews guests who are sitting in the sidecar of his motorcycle as David pilots the bike around town. David also created and stars in another web series called Pillars with co-star, Kevin Yon. David became an on-call firefighter with Grand Rapids Township in Michigan….his wife is nervous.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Rahn Hortman - Good Game
programme.desc: Rahn credits the earliest influences to his humor to Bill Cosby and Martin Lawrence. Bill Cosby's ability to tackle diverse subject matter without uttering a single curse word, and Martin Lawrence's natural gift of representing the "ordinary guy" combined to form the foundation for Rahn's vision. What resulted is a unique blend of profanity-free banter, with pointed observations about everyday people that leave no one safe.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Chris Voth - Cashmere
programme.desc: Chris Voth is an accomplished comedian, a licensed teacher, and a published author. Voth made his debut late-night television appearance on the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. He also appeared in three seasons of NBC's Last Comic Standing and was chosen for the prestigious Great American Comedy Festival. A 15-year comedy veteran, Voth is a past winner of the Denver Comedy Works Competition and has worked with everyone from Dave Chappelle to Larry the Cable Guy to Linda Ronstadt. Voth’s first comedy CD titled "Never Mind the Jim J Bullocks, Here's the Chris Voth" is currently available for purchase. Chris currently balances his performance schedule with his full-time high-school teaching career. You can read his short story, "Stand Up and Deliver," published in the Cream City Review Literary Journal. In it, Chris shares the experiences he had when entering the teaching field after years in stand-up comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dave Nihill - Documented
programme.desc: Dave is the winner of the prestigious 43rd annual San Francisco Comedy Competition, and runner up in the Moth’s largest US Grandslam storytelling competition.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Costaki Economopoulos - Now That I'm A Grown-up
programme.desc: For 20 years Costaki has been living his dream as a full-time stand up comic. He has written jokes for Bette Midler, Jay Leno, MTV, and BET. You may have seen him on Showtime or heard him on Sirius, but you probably know him best from his regular appearances on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Radio Show.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Scott Novotny - A Trip to Goofyville
programme.desc: Scott Novotny brings his high-energy goofyness to the live audience at VidAngel Studios.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Karen Morgan - Go Dawgs!
programme.desc: A former trial attorney, she moved from the courtroom to comedy after being selected as a Finalist on Nickelodeon TV’s Search for the Funniest Mom in America.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Josh Blue - The Disabled List
programme.desc: Following his groundbreaking win on NBC’s Last Comic Standing in 2006, Josh Blue has risen through the ranks to become a well-established headliner at venues throughout the world.

programme.title: Steve Soelberg - WE SAY BIM
programme.desc: Extremely funny comedian and overall nice person Steve Soelberg brings an observational, story telling style of comedy which has repeatedly left his regularly sold out audiences in stitches. Whether he's relating the experiences of growing up in a large family in Seattle, Washington or recounting the time he saw an angry guy in a tutu at a Ragnar relay, he has a way of making each audience member feel as if they were just the person he wanted to tell the story to because he knew they'd enjoy it just as much as he did. Due to his growing popularity as a comedian, he has appeared multiple times on local TV affiliates (Fox, KUTV, and KSL), on the radio, and has entertained tens of thousands traveling the country not only as comedian, but also as the voice of the Ragnar relay races as their race announcer and emcee. Steve's positive, upbeat personality paired with his observational, often self deprecating humor and his ability to appeal to a broad audience guarantee his shows will be a hilarious and memorable experience for all those who attend.
